miniapp.name: Lottery Mini App
miniapp.subtitle: Hourly lottery, instant wins
miniapp.description: Join the hourly lottery! Buy tickets for $0.1 each, match 2 numbers, and win 90% of the prize pool. New round every hour!
miniapp.ogTitle: Lottery Mini App - Hourly Lottery on Base
miniapp.ogDescription: Join the hourly lottery! Buy tickets for $0.1 each and win 90% of the prize pool.
